comment: On the first day, she joked about beating up students and mentioned owning a bunch of weapons—def not for the easily offended. She's an easy grader but mostly talked about random stuff, not the assignments. Attendance was random, and the workload was light with just a few assignments a week.

She was a very kind professor who based her class around music. I enjoyed her assignments as they gave me a chance to write about things I was genuinely interested in. Not many people attended her lectures (not sure why, she was very fun) but those who did understand how good of a time her class was. My favorite class in my freshman year. Loved her

She is haha funny person. Apparently, English teachers have their own "area of writing" and hers was movies. Sure she wasn't good about answering emails, but everything was very clear. She had a week of grace in the final week of class, and also a multimodal project that if good enough to her, you could exempt the final. GET READY TO WRITE, TAKEHER

All she does is yap and it has nothing to do with the course material. she is also kinda rude and doesn't respond to emails. and tbh when I asked questions she was never able to answer them. just made me more confused.

i thought this class would be fun, but boy was i wrong. she made class very uncomfortable to speak in. she was very rude and not understanding at all. she makes up assignments from the top of her head with no clear rubric. overall not a good teacher at all.
Literally the worst professor I have ever taken. She never responded to a single email I sent. Lectures were interesting but never helped with our classwork. She would ramble about Jay Z.

DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR UNLESS YOU WANT A HARD TIME PASSING A CLASS. She was always canceling classes with no notice. Very rude and joked about inappropriate/sensitive topics. Never ever graded anything on time. Horrible at answering emails. Give yourself some grace and don't take this class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--So many papers--Lecture heavy

comment: Never responded to emails. Didn't grade anything till the end of the semester. Never stayed on topic. Very rude for some reason. Also had a weird obsession with lying...

Dr. Bailey is the best professor I have ever taken. Her expectations were clear and she was very gracious with grading. Super accessible and her lectures were entertaining. I very much enjoyed her stories. I would take her again in a heartbeat, the best class I have taken yet. If you get the chance to take a course by her I highly recommend it!
